signin.title: Sign in into your account
signin.description: Enter your account information below to access.

email.title: Email
email.min_length: Email should be at least 4 characters

password.title: Password
password.min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
password.max_length: Password must be at most 50 characters

errors.invalid_data: Please check your credentials and try again.
errors.request_error: An unexpected error occurred while processing the request

signup.title: Create an account
signup.description: Enter your account information below to create it.

errors.invalid_data: Please check your credentials and try again.

errors.email_min_length: Email should be at least 6 characters
errors.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.password_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
errors.password_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
errors.password_number: Password must contain at least one number
errors.password_special_character: Password must contain at least one special character
errors.password_invalid_start: Password cannot start with a dot or newline
errors.confirm_password_min_length: Confirm password must be at least 8 characters
errors.organization_name_min_length: Organization name must be at least 3 characters
errors.first_name_min_length: First name must be at least 3 characters
errors.last_name_min_length: Last name must be at least 3 characters
